benchmark_details.name: DefAn: Definitive Answer Dataset for LLMs
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark dataset to evaluate hallucination in large language models (LLMs) with over 75,000 prompts across eight domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the hallucination in LLMs and measure their factual accuracy, faithfulness to prompts, and response consistency.
tasks: Assess factuality and consistency of LLM responses

data.annotation: Manually curated and checked by human experts

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on comparison with reference answers and prompts.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates indicate more hallucination and less adherence to prompts.
methodology.validation: Validation performed by comparing output to expected answers and measuring coherence across paraphrases.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Dataset sourced from publicly available information.
